about_the_game:
This set of 3D models contains various historical and modern scatterguns: a cheap way of hurling lead in large quantities.
Models included in the pack:
1. Benelli M4 Super 90
2. Browning A5
3. Remington 870
4. Mossberg 500 SPX
5. Spas-12
6. Winchester Model 21
7. Pancor Jackhammer
8. USAS-12
9. Winchester Model 1897
10. SAIGA-12

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu Linux, version 10.10 or later
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu Linux, version 10.10 or later
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any

  • Sound Card: any
mac_requirements.recommended:

short_description: This set of 3D models contains various historical and modern scatterguns: a cheap way of hurling lead in large quantities. Models included in the pack: Benelli M4 Super 90, Browning A5, Remington 870, Mossberg 500 SPX, Spas-12, Winchester Model 21, Pancor Jackhammer, USAS-12, Winchester Model 1897, SAIGA-12
